description: This crewneck sweater is knit from soft cotton and paneled with quilted patches for a modern utilitarian look.
fitting_details: Regular Fit: wider at the chest while still maintaining a modern silhouette.
Size medium has a 27" body length (front and back), a 17.75" shoulder, a 42" chest, and a 27" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 0.5" between sizes.
Long sleeves with rib-knit cuffs. Quilted woven patches at the shoulders and forearms.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
Shell: 100% cotton. Patches: 100% polyester. Exclusive of decoration.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
